title: 3 Bed 1 Bath Apartment Little Italy
map_address: Murray Hill Rd near Mayfield Rd
posting_body: ['Available starting 8/1/2022 (August 1st)', 'Spacious three bedroom, one bath apartment in the heart of Little Italy.', 'Rental application required, must consent to background check.', 'Rent is $1,550 per month.', 'Price includes HEAT, water, sewer, and garbage collection.', 'Tenant pays gas and electric.', 'Secure entrance to building.', 'Apartment includes private patio, original hardwood floors, large kitchen with dishwasher, updated appliances and great views of the neighborhood.', 'Has been freshly painted, and lots of storage throughout.', 'Minutes from CWRU, CIA, CIM, restaurants, shopping, museums, orchestra, hospitals, public transportation, and much more.', 'Directly across the street from coin laundromat.']
